outcome: Foreign cyber-espionage is revealed as the cause behind system failures and Halden's death.

events.description: Encrypted communications between foreign agents and domestic operatives hint at coordinated cyber-espionage activities.
A coded map is discovered, leading to the exposure of foreign espionage networks operating within Stenograd.
Stenograd's government issues a statement condemning foreign interference, vowing to fortify cybersecurity frameworks.
New cyber defense measures are enacted, focusing on safeguarding critical infrastructure from external threats.
